title.canonical: Sayonara no Asa ni Yakusoku no Hana wo Kazarou
title.romaji: Sayonara no Asa ni Yakusoku no Hana wo Kazarou
title.english: Maquia: When the Promised Flower Blooms
title.japanese: さよならの朝に約束の花をかざろう
synonyms: Let Us Adorn the Morning of Farewells With Flowers
Adorn the Flower of Promise at the Morning of Farewell

summary: The people of Iolph have a lifespan of hundreds of years and maintain their teenage appearances for life, but when the peace of this town is shattered by those who want the secret to their longevity for themselves, a young girl named Maquia is forced to escape. Wandering the land alone, upon finding an orphaned baby she chooses to raise him, but as this boy grows up so the difference in their lifespans is thrown into ever-sharper relief.
